content: the same way 3ch and 2tr in the last square you did for the square until the same space 1ch you have turned the first corner snip off the tails as you did on the square now 3tr in the middle of continue joining in the usual it should look like this the 4tr in the centre and slip_stitch way remember on the last continue working around to join the blanket this is side you will need to make 3 the edge following the what turns the square into trebles between the 4 square/ rectangle a rectangle trebles in the centre to placement on the complete the rectangle chart to complete round 12 © anita gibney 2015/2024 madebyanita co uk all rights reserved please do not copy sell share or otherwise distribute this pattern 19 grace round 13 rsu join colour a between two work a tr2tog at every point treble clusters in any mini granny do not join where two squares join yarn where the squares are joined 2ch and then 2tr now work tr2tog at the point where the next two squares join in exactly the same way as you did in round 1 continue working join the yarn in the centre around the blanket remembering to tr2tog at space of a square every point where two squares join at the corners work 3tr 2ch 3tr when you have worked all the way around join with a slip_stitch do not cut yarn round 14 rsd work 1 granny round round 15 rsu work 1 granny round round 16 rsd work 1 granny round round 17 rsu work 1 granny round round 18 rsd join colour b in any space between 3tr 2ch 1tr 1ch in same space 2tr 1ch in each space around at the corners work 2tr 3ch 2tr 1ch when you have worked all the way around ending with a 1ch join with a slip_stitch into top of 2ch and fasten_off cut yarn round 19 rsu join colour a in any chain space work 1 granny round round 20 rsd repeat round 18 round 21 - rsu join colour a in any chain space work 1 granny round round 22 rsd work 1 granny round round 23 rsu work 1 granny round round 24 rsd work 1 granny round round 25 will take you to this point round 25 rsu work 1 granny round join with a slip_stitch and fasten_off cut yarn © anita gibney 2015/2024 madebyanita co uk all rights reserved please do not copy sell share or otherwise distribute this pattern 20 grace starbursts round 26 rsu before starting to join your starbursts check you have the correct number of 3tr clusters there should be 56 x 3tr clusters on each side this round consists of 60 starburst squares these are worked in exactly the same way as the starbursts in the central panel with the exception that the final round will be join as you go this is the technique you used to
